EmailTemplate.name: Last Login 30 Days HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: 30 Days of Salesforce.com Inactivity - Please Login
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!uf__User_Status__c.uf__User__c},

You have not logged into Salesforce.com in 30 days. Your manager has been notified.

Login to Salesforce.com and visit this link:
https://cargill18.my.salesforce.com/{!uf__User_Status__c.Id}

Please update this record with an explanation of why you have been inactive. Within this record, you can specify if you still need access to Salesforce.com.

Please click this link if you no longer need access to Salesforce.com (be careful):
I DO NOT NEED A SALESFORCE LICENSE ANY LONGER
